name: 10 Seconds FARM!
description:
A busy farming game for the busy modern person, where one day passes in just 10 seconds!
No relaxation! No chill! No pause button!
Grow and harvest as many crops as you can within 40 days and make money by any means necessary!
Earn money to level up and become even busier!

Controls: 

Arrow keys or WASD: Move
Spacebar or Enter key: Spread seeds, fertilizer, water, and swap item
Gamepad compatible.

Game Tips (Spoiler Alert!):

Each crop has a specific Growth value required for it to grow.
Every day, the growth value is increased according to the following formula, and when the required value is reached, the crop becomes harvestable.

(Base value 1 + Fertilizer Bonus if fertilizer is applied) * (Water Bonus Multiplier if watered) + (Sunlight Bonus if not raining)

*Initial value of Fertilizer Bonus is 2
*Initial value of Sunlight Bonus is 1

Crops:

Music and Sound by tsukihiko

Super cute sprite assets "SPROUT LANDS" by Cup Nooble
